category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_pattern_match_style
preference.preference_description: Indicates the pattern matching style to use. Valid values are 1/2/3. 1 - use "%" for multi-char replacement, use "_" for single char replacement. 2 - use "*" for multi-char replacement, use "." for single char replacement. 3 - use "*" for multi-char replacement, use "?" for single char replacement.
